column5: hey just wondering if anyone knows the condition of the ramp down by the beach on chandos? Is there a dock? i am taking the father in law out this weekend for some pike he is quite ill and not sure if he will be able to get into the boat with out a dock.  thanks
No dock at the beach ramp  Scott

Hi there. No dock at the beach. However leave him in the boat when you launch  and load it i used to do that with my grandmother when i would take her fishing. i would help her get in with this mini step ladder i would carry or a milk crate.
